class_notes: (Concurrent enrollment in CE 552ANGb, TPb, 552b required; permission number required to enroll; request permission by contacting candlerregistrar@emory.edu prior to pre-registration)
course_description:
An exegetical study of the book of Psalms with special attention to the Psalms' rhetoric and theology and their function as prayer. (OT617CEE when offered as a Contextual
Education Elective).
